location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'INDEX MAP ROUTES IN PERSIA VOL. II.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 623 x 748mm, on sheet 658 x 788mm

mods.abstract: The map is a General Staff India publication marked for official use only, and accompanies Routes in Persia. (Volume II.) (North-Western Persia.).The map shows a region of northern and western Persia, indicating routes described in the volume, cities, towns, roads, tracks and paths. Numbers and letters identify the corresponding Survey of India sheets.The map includes a printing statement which reads 'Simla Drawing Office. No 3371. October. 1922.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
